column1: #Text=I 'm Varrick , of Varrick Industries , International -- -- and this is Spirit Vine Experiment 3 - 02 .
#Text=" Varrick says : " In this stasis capsule is a preserved spirit vine sample weighing approximately two " Zhu Lis " .
#Text=" Varrick says : " I have postulated that these spirit vines are a form of pure energy that 's unstable in what we call -- -- " typical earth conditions " .

#Text=This machine should transfer the energy from the vine into a battery using electrical currents , reverse magnetic polarity , and a little - known phenomenon I like to call -- -- the Varri - Effect !
#Text=You know , you could stand to lose a few Zhu Lis !
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " I think you 're just weak , sir !
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " Varrick ... you saved me .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Of course I saved you .
#Text=" Varrick says : " I ca n't clean this place up by myself !
#Text=I 'm putting the kibosh on this project .
#Text=Do you realize what we could do with this kind of power ?
#Text=And that 's why we got ta put an end to it !
#Text=What if it fell into the wrong hands ?
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Since when does that matter to you ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " I know , it 's not like me , right ?
#Text=Usually I look at a project like this and think , " Wow !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Well , I 'm the other voice in your head , and I 'm telling you you will continue with this project .
#Text=I just really got ta stand my ground on this one -- Whoa !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " And now there 's a voice in my head telling me to drop you on the tracks .
#Text=Head voices are liars , what do head voices know ?
#Text=" Asami says : " I came to return these .
#Text=" Hiroshi says : " You never opened them .
#Text=I never want to see or hear from you again .
#Text=" Hiroshi says : " Please , just let me say one thing , then I 'll never contact you again .
#Text=" Hiroshi says : " I ca n't forgive myself for all the horrible things I 've done .
#Text=And I never expect you to forgive me .
#Text=I tore our family apart , and destroyed our good name .
#Text=But in a life of regret , you 're the one thing I look back on that makes me smile .
#Text=I just want you to know I 'm so proud of you , Asami .
#Text=You are the greatest thing I ever created .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Am ... I in trouble ?
#Text=We want you to be a part of our inner circle .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " It means you 've proven your worth .
#Text=We 're so close to uniting the Empire , but Su has some resentment towards me and Baatar that might cloud her judgment and stop her from making a wise decision .
#Text=We believe you can help her see clearly .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I can do that !
#Text=By the time I 'm finished telling her all the great things we 've done , she 'll be begging to join !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Are n't all these troops gon na send the wrong message ?
#Text=" Kuvira says : " The army is here to project strength .
#Text=I know , why do n't we all stand in a circle , huh ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " I 'm not giving up Zaofu .
#Text=I do n't care if you brought your entire army .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Su , I did n't bring my army to threaten you .
#Text=I wanted to show you all that your son and I have accomplished .
#Text=" Suyin says : " You must realize what you 're doing goes against everything your father and I tried to teach you .
#Text=" Baatar says : " Son , you belong here .
#Text=So that I could go on living in your shadow ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " Do n't say that !
#Text=Ca n't you see she 's brainwashed you !
#Text=And now he 's accomplished more with me than he ever could with you .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Okay , guys , obviously , there 's a lot of personal , painful history here , so what do you say we just all forget about that stuff , huh ?
#Text=You guys know what I 'm talkin ' ' bout , right ?
#Text=You know what I think we need to do ?
#Text=And the future is bright , let me tell you !
#Text=We went to this town that had nothing .
#Text=Most of the people there had never seen a Satomobile before .
#Text=Now , they have two Satomobiles , running water , and a magnet train that goes right through their town !
#Text=" Opal says : " They might have been happy when you first arrived , but I 've seen what happens after you leave .
#Text=Citizens are forced to work as slave labor , dissenters are sent off to who - knows - where !
#Text=Now , I do n't know what you think you 've seen , but I am giving you the one - hundred - percent Bolin guarantee that we 're making the Earth Empire a better place to live !
#Text=" Suyin says : " I ca n't believe you brought Bolin here to try and sway us .
#Text=Zaofu will never accept you as their leader !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Then you leave me no choice .
#Text=You have twenty - four hours to agree to join the Empire , or we take the city by force .
